Какви са най-често задаваните въпроси, к: What are the most frequently asked questions that concern our customers before we start our joint work
КОЛКО ПАРИ ЩЕ МИ СТРУВА: How much will it cost me?
Всеки наш проект има индивидуален дизайн: Every one of our projects has an individual design and business logic. The offer we will make for the development of a website or online store will be specially created for you in terms of price-quality ratio and will be tailored to the goals you are pursuing, the functionality and the scale of the site.
КАКВО ОЧАКВАТЕ ОТ МЕН: What do you expect from me?
От Вас очакваме да ни предоставите инфор: We expect you to provide us with the information you want to use to present your business, activities, products and/or services. Of course, our team will assist you with suggestions, recommendations and detailed instructions. If you don't have time for this preparation, we can also help you with this stage.
Добре изработеният сайт генерира приходи: The well-crafted website generates income from your online space for years to come. Our professional advice is not to focus on differences of a few hundred leva that return instantly as an investment, but to compare the offers on what they will bring to your business.
КОЛКО ВАРИАНТА НА ВИЗИИ ЩЕ МИ ДАДЕТЕ: How many site vision options will you give me?
Ние не работим по готови темплейти, зато: We don't work with ready-made templates, so we provide individual designs that are in line with your vision preferences. They are combined with successful working practices to provide you with the best solutions. Of course, it goes through your approval and corrections if necessary.
Възможностите са безкрайни затова избира: The possibilities are endless, so we choose the most optimal way, but the most common ways are through social networks and/or search engine optimization.
